SEARCH
Module com.github.jh3nd3rs0n.jargyle.common
Package com.github.jh3nd3rs0n.jargyle.common.net

Class NetInterface

java.lang.Object
com.github.jh3nd3rs0n.jargyle.common.net.NetInterface
public final class NetInterface extends Object
An interface between the local system and a network. It is a wrapper of a NetworkInterface and its InetAddresses assigned to it.

    • newInstanceFrom

      public static NetInterface newInstanceFrom(String s)
      Returns a new NetInterface from the provided String of the name of the network interface. An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if the provided String of the name of the network interface is unknown. An UncheckedIOException is thrown if an I/O error occurs in searching for the network interface.
      Parameters:
      s - the provided String of the name of the network interface
      Returns:
      a new NetInterface from the provided String of the name of the network interface
